Pass or Fail? We know the experiments

We run, explore it all teaches us how to grow as a company

Experiment 19

Two In Three Out

You work five days a week—do they all have to be in the same place?

For a few years, we’ve run our live answering business on a distributed model—hundreds of CX Specialists work at home across the U.S., answering our clients’ calls over the Internet.
